answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The report says a mild disc bulge. Unless the disc bulge is causing narrowing of the spinal canal or if the foramina through which the nerve comes out are narrowed significantly to cause nerve  compression, your symptoms may not be due to the changes in the vertebra. The dizziness could be due to the inner ear problem. The numbness and tingling in the face could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. Please discuss this with your doctor, he may ask for blood tests to rule out the above mentioned causes.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
